name: Hollow (itch) (TheFourthFate)
description:
Originally made for a class project for Narrative Design, and part of an Apocalypse game jam. 

Warning; has a darker tone.

The world has undergone a slow, and painful end. Resources have been scooped up and expunged bit by bit. Countries attempt war with each other, but nobody wins. Most of the population is gone, and as a final adventure you decide to make a journey from the city of Vancouver, the the province of Nova Scotia. This cross-Canada adventure has many dangerous paths, if you are not careful you may find your end. Will you be able to make the trip?
